summary:
I am a very social, communcative strong, positive person who feels that together you are stronger then on your own. 

Working under some pressure and with deadlines is not something that I am afraid of, I feel that it can help you push yourself a little further than your comfort zone. And I see it as a challenge and opportunity to grow and excell in my work. 

I am a quick learner and think that two of my strong qualities are planning and time management. 
Connecting with other people and establishing a good communication is where I feel at my best.
It is when we can all come together and work on a shared goal you can achieve the best result. 

Interacting with people and help them to learn and/or achieve more is something I enjoy very much. The leadership role is not something I am scared off and is more often the role I choose to be in. 

In my personal life I have had some challenges which helped me learn more about myself and let me be the strong, persistent, determined person I am today, of which I am very proud off. Giving up is not in my dictionary.     

I would like to develop myself further in Finance and grown into a managing position.
Developing my SAP skills even further is something I am very willing to do.

education.field_of_study: Business economics / Economie en management / Economie en zakelijk beheer
Business economics / Economie en management / Economie en zakelijk beheer

projects.title: Implementation and continues optimalization of Digital Invoice System within Navision
projects.description:
Shared projectlead for the implemenation of Document Capture within the current ERP system (Navision).
Document Capture is a tool that can be implemented in Navision to process purchase invoices digitally. 
Up to implementation invoices were received by email and/or post, were printed, stamped and manually entered in Navision. 
With the implementation of Document Capture this process is digitalised. Invoices are received by email, automatically imported in Navision and some data is already read and filled in, saving a huge amount of time daily. 
Continues optimalization of Document Capture for automatic matching against purchase orders and coding against general ledger accounts is still ongoing. 
Project was spread over several companies within the division and included end user training and set up presentations through out the relevant companies.

projects.title: Project Assistant Procurement, Logistics and Product Management Department
projects.description:
Assist (full time) for 3 months in projects for the Procurement, Logistics and Product Management Department. 
Analyze, improve and process description regarding Freight Costing in SAP, Long Term Supplier Declarations, assist in Product Costing including reporting to management and obsolete stock calculations.

projects.title: Implementation Werkkostenregeling
projects.description: Acting as a representative and coordinator of the finance department for the dutch entities to work with HR and external advisor with implementation of the dutch Werkkostenregeling which is mandatory as of January 1st 2015. Containing consultation with departments involved, creating financial reports and system design to optimize financial output.

projects.title: Transition work to India
projects.description:
Actively participate in the transfer of all accounting work to India. 
Training of employees in SAP system, procedures and processes within Ashland and own work regarding two large manufacturing legal entities. All according to SOX, internal and external policies and procedures. 
Create work processes and descriptions and record all work in order to facilitate a smooth transition period. 
Expected ending date December 2015.

projects.title: SAP Implementation
projects.description:
Ashland Inc. bought a company that needed to be implemented in our current business. This involved the new company being implemented as well in our SAP system. 
In my role as power user for the Accounting Department I travelled to Moscow and the USA to participate in testing cycles and training session. 
Special training session were hosted in which I had to teach and train the new employees in the usage of SAP after their implementation. 
Continues support is still given after implementation to help with SAP questions and problems.
